input.sentences: the smiths are having a family reunion .
the whole family has come out for a fun time today .
they are having some drinks and chatting about old times .
the night was so long that [male] passed out from all of the fun .
he even passed out on the car ride home .
output.sentences: A group of young people had a party.
They party went on well into the night.
There was a lot of drinking at the party.
Hans drank too much and passed out.
The group put the sleeping Hans into a cab to send him home.
